message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.DS 

This paper proposes a framework for adapting the coordinate system in nature-inspired optimization algorithms, which are commonly used in machine learning and optimization problems. The paper discusses the use of a covariance matrix adaptation strategy and an archiving mechanism, which are techniques commonly used in optimization and machine learning. The paper also discusses the use of particle swarm optimization and differential evolution, which are popular optimization algorithms in machine learning. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.SY (Systems and Control), and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
